title: Blooming Mangalsutra Pendant Necklace
materials: black onyx beads. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and tarnish resistance.
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra, featuring a delicate floral pendant studded with shimmering simulated diamonds. The rose gold plating provides a warm and romantic touch, while the classic black beads offer protection and good fortune. The pendant's openwork design allows light to pass through, maximizing the brilliance of the stones.
description: This contemporary Mangalsutra beautifully blends tradition and modernity, making it a versatile piece for the modern Indian woman. The high-quality simulated diamonds offer a luxurious look without the high price tag. The rose gold plating and Hyderabadi polish ensure durability and lasting shine. It is a perfect symbol of love and commitment with a touch of contemporary flair.
